sentences.sContent: They ended up ripping down perimeter fencing and tussling with the security staff.
sentences.sCn: 他们最终扯掉了周边的栅栏，并和保安人员扭打起来。

remMethod.val: tuss(看作fuss， 忙乱) + le → 为什么忙乱， 因为有人扭打搏斗 → 扭打， 争斗

trans.tranOther: to fight or struggle without using any weapons, by pulling or pushing someone rather than hitting them
a fight using a lot of energy, in which two people get hold of each other and struggle
